Name: 6 PEOPLE
About the game: A man travels in a subway car alone. Where is he going? Will he or any of his fellow passengers arrive at their destination? Have they been drawn together by pure coincidence, or something more sinister? Join the passengers and ride the subway to its end to witness the first mysterious event in this three part series from GsK. This visual novel has a running time of 10 minutes and one ending. The following two games in this series will be released in the near future, so please check back in the coming months.
